file_content.text: You left the base? What are you doing here?
Terminating a bad lump!
But... why? What did I do wrong, master?
You could've just told me the plan changed. Was this a test?
Appreciation: Nice try.
An admirable attempt to distract us. I'll pretend I nearly fell for it.
Suggestion: Try crying.
I hear meatbag tears are good for manipulation, if that's what you're attempting.
Judgment: That was pathetic.
Your meatbag wailings only hurt my sonoreceptors.
Hah! You don't fool him, Shroud!
I'm not the Shroud! You are!
Nooo, I think I'd remember that.
Right, HK?
Contradiction: Actually...
Maybe we should hear him out.
Evasion: Anything is possible.
Today has worn out my bewilderment module.
Declaration: I've had enough.
One false move, and I'll vaporize you both.
Prove your claim, cyborg meatbag.
I can't. She forced me to play "the Shroud" even in her base. She never put herself at risk. That was my job--to be expendable.
Admission: It does make sense.
You tell an oddly compelling tale.
Do you have any idea what it's like, pretending to be a galactic mastermind? The performance pressure is huge!
You seemed pretty good with it... until now.
You attached a bomb to my skull, you monster! I mean... master.
Counterpoint: Your appearance.
If you are not the Shroud, why do you look like him?
Rejection: I saw your holos.
I watched recordings of you, pontificating on your grand plans.
Those were acting lessons! She was coaching me to talk like her.
You were very convincing.
Thank you?
In the hangar, the self-destruct computer asked for a cancel code. It wouldn't have, unless...
But I don't want to destroy the Alliance base! Stop this--now!
Shroud voice override confirmed. Disarming sabotage network. Disabling thermal detonators.
Oh! Oh, dear....
Please... I was just following orders. It's not me you want dead.
Verdict: Master will decide.
You colluded with the real Shroud to destroy this base. At a minimum, you can look forward to a lengthy prison sentence and interrogation by my master.
Until then, stay put.
I suppose I'm going to prison, too. I hope your master isn't too harsh.
Conviction: Termination.
You planted bombs to kill people here. For that, you deserve to die. Complication: Master forbid me to target a surrendered enemy.
Solution: It does not violate protocol to target offensive material. I find your clothing highly offensive.
That felt wonderful.
But he wasn't the Shroud. Not the real one. You should blast me, too.
Reassurance: I won't hurt you.
Punishing you would be pointless. You're not the Shroud. You're Zeeyo.
Do you really think so?
Alternative: Serve my master.
The Shroud died when your memory failed. Doctor Oggurobb will dismantle you and remove anything problematic in your shiny innards.
You'd do that for me? Thank you!
Whatever horrible misdeeds you've committed are in the past. From now on, you fight for the Alliance.
Oh, HK... you're the best friend I've got!
Correction: I'm the only...
Never mind.
Hello! I am Zeeyo Ohm. It's nice to meet you!
Judgment: Deactivation. Now.
You are a defective machine that has brought untold suffering to the galaxy. As the meatbags say, "better safe than sorry."
Ahem! HK...
We leave you alone for one day...
I expect an explanation.
Greetings, master. I am happy to debrief you.
Warning: It's a long story.
Call security and pull up a chair. We'll be a while.
Dismissal: Actually, forget it.
But you wouldn't believe me.
Analysis: I need a vacation.
But first, a full recharge. Entering sleep mode. Good night.
I'm the fifty-first person to play this role. She put me through hours of agonizing facial reconstruction.
You look great.
I can't feel my face!
You intended to kill my master. Pun: I will now cancel your life.
What? That's not a pun--
